channel.title: Error Connecting
channel.description:
So I recently started working on my own private server. I use to have one a long time ago, And I thought I still remembered how to do everything, but apparently I have forgot something. My only problem is that I can get on my server and play fine. Everything works for me. But my friends can't log in on there computers. And before you ask.. Yes, I have protforwarded. I even checked the status of the server on Runelocus. It says my server "is ONLINE and playable"
Are these the only codes you have to edit in your client files for it to connect to the server? Client.java: [code]public static String server = "SERVER IP GOES HERE";[/code] [code]server = "SERVER IP GOES HERE";[/code]
And do I need to change this in Gui.java to my server ip or just 127.0.0.1? [code]sign.signlink.startpriv(InetAddress.getByName("127.0.0.1"));[/code]
Can somebody help?

item.title: Error Connecting
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

Just replace every “127.0.0.1” by your ip and don’t forget to compile. If it doesn’t work something else than the ip has to be the issue

Read full topic
